description: generic item template
A shallow dish for holding a bar of soap.  It has ridges to help drain water away from the dish.  Not the most exciting of items.
A razor blade on a comfortable handle.  Much easier to shave with than a loose razor.
//: the end of the world doesn't mean everyone is okay with having ZZ Top beards.  disposable razors are a hot commodity.  The razor also loses the Cutting 1 quality.  Don't ask how we confirmed this.

description: A plastic brush with soft bristles for cleaning your teeth.

snippet_category.text: A plastic brush with soft bristles for cleaning your teeth.  It has a cheap, blocky handle and is likely meant to be disposable.
A combination toothbrush and gum massager.  It has an ergonomic silicone grip.  Luxurious!
A plastic brush with soft bristles for cleaning your teeth.  The blue and white pattern on the handle implies cleanliness.
A short toothbrush designed for children.  It has a wide-eyed cartoon pony on the handle.
A short toothbrush designed for children.  It has a grinning red racecar on the handle.

description: Someone has been using this plastic toothbrush to clean grease or muck.  It is now irrevocably dirty.
An instrument of hair torture.

snippet_category.text: An instrument of hair torture.  There are round safety tips on the bristles.
An old-fashioned hair-straightening device with a faux-wood handle.
A soft, cushioned hairbrush.  The shiny chrome design appears modern.
A tacky kid's hairbrush.  The cartoon whale on the handle seems friendly enough.

description: A soft plastic cylinder you can wrap a lock of your hair around to curl it.
Twenty-five yards of finely waxed thread wound up inside a plastic container.  Perfect for picking bits of smoked meat out of your teeth.  Disassemble to use the thread for something else.
A grooming tool with teeth for straightening your hair.

snippet_category.text: Somehow, a few teeth have already broken off the end of this otherwise pristine comb.
A grooming tool with teeth for straightening your hair.  This one is narrow, black and austere.
A comb made of soft plastic.  Its tortoiseshell pattern makes it seem antique.
A comb which folds on a hinge, in case you want to look like a greaser.

description: A rubber-tipped tool for unclogging pipes, or a club for an immature survivor.
//: the volume is pretty bulky, but this is an old fashioned model.

description: This hollow plastic toilet plunger's bell compresses like an accordion.  It is efficient at its intended purpose, and complete rubbish as a weapon.
A luxurious remnant of civilization.

snippet_category.text: Imagine the thinnest, most disposable paper you could possibly make.  Now imagine something thinner than that.
This roll of toilet paper is two-ply and quilted, for vandalizing houses more comfortably than ever.
This brand of toilet paper is designed to dissolve completely in water!
Images of your least favorite politician are printed on each individual sheet.
A luxurious remnant of civilization.  The splinters of unprocessed wood visible in this one make it seem less luxurious, though.

description: This tool dries your hair by pushing air through a coil of hot wires.  Without a functioning power grid, it is a motorized paper weight.
A wand made of heat-resistant ceramics.  When plugged into an outlet, it is hot enough to shape your hair into curls.  Too bad the power's out.
Zombies cannot be intimidated or humiliated, so this stiff brush is only useful for scouring toilet bowls.
A stainless-steel comb with spiral grooved teeth designed to remove pesky parasites from hair.  Even just thinking about it makes you itch.
A plastic floating bath toy.

snippet_category.text: A plastic floating bath toy.
A yellow rubber duck.  Designed to dropped in the bath.
A black rubber duck with large white eyes.  Designed to dropped in the bath.
A small green dinosaur with a wide grin.  Designed for bath time.

description: A plastic electric toothbrush.
A squeezable bottle used to hold various bathroom soaps.

snippet_category.text: A bottle for special shampoo for dyed hair.
A plain white bottle made to contain the cheapest shampoo.
A bottle for body wash.  This one is called 'Afrika'.
A bottle for hair conditioner.
A colorful bottle of body and hair wash marketed for children.
A plain white bottle made to contain the cheapest hair conditioner.
A plain white bottle made to contain the cheapest shower gel.

description: A standard set of prosthetic teeth.  Pretty useless to anyone aside from its owner.
